item.title: AWS Billing Transfer
item.description: AWS Billing Transfer is a new feature (GA since November 2025) that streamlines billing management across multiple AWS Organizations. It helps companies and channel partners who manage multiple Organizations by enabling centralized billing while keeping security and autonomy decentralized for business units or end customers. item.title: AWS Control Tower Landing Zone 4.0 is out! After 8 years of multi-account pain, we can FINALLY set up everything programmatically
item.description: AWS Control Tower Landing Zone 4.0 introduces a flexible Controls-Only experience, allowing full programmatic setup and customization of multi-account environments.
